В общем, слушай сюда.
Ты попал парень, да ты, тот что думаешь, что не ты. С тобой в купе едут три придурка, ты четвёртый.
Ты удивишься и спросишь зачем? Конечно чтобы чинить генераторы! Ты будешь чинить их в кукурузных полях, среди развалин, в домах и много где ещё. В этом время к твоему поперечному будут красться 3 вида мужиков: трап, скрытный пидорас и профи по вырезанию статуй из льда (бензопилой офк). Всё что они хотят, это насадить твою ихидную рожу на свой крючёчек. Возможно ты и сам захочешь насодить таких же 4х долбаёбов на свой крюк, да поглубже.
В конечном итоге ты убежишь от всего этого дерьма парень, всегда убегал.

Плюсы: 

Крюки
Пилы
Капканы
Паук из Лимбо
Чувство страха от погони
Паркур в окно
Можно крысить

Минусы:
Паркур в окно over9000 раз (если ты не траппер, сасай)
Крысят
Долгий поиск игроков (онлайн подрастёт, будет норм)
Дропается подключение, быает по 10 раз запускаешь поиск, а он не стартует
Разрыв поперечного от того, что ловят первым
Относительно слабая оптимизация

So after playing this game with my freinds and having so much fun. I can say this is a good one. If you and your freinds are looking for a good hide and seek/horro game this would be it. The game is also suported and being updated to. Which shows that the development staff care about it. You may find it crash or lag but this is not something that happens all the time. I only notice it when I had alot of stuff running in the brack ground. But that is an issue that will most likly be fix and soon. Worth the money.

The game is intense and fun.  You'll get a rush playing this game.  THRILLER. 

However, the game is not perfect.  Alot of in-game improvements are needed such as group partying, variation of objectives and matchmaking/ranking.

It is not for everyone. You will need a certain kind of skill set to succeed in this game. 

Alot of babies in the DbD community as it's split apart - SURVIVORS vs. KILLERS - each having their own biased opinions about the game in terms of gameplay causing the developers to nerf and buff. 

imo the changes doesn't really effect me in either spectrum as its still fun and I'm still winning most of the time either way when I play smart.

SO BUYERS BEWARE - If you can't adapt - move on to something easier? If you can take the challenge get ready your in for a fright!

This is one of the most entertaining games i have ever played. It got horror, Comedy, teamwork. Everything i love with a game. The only downside i have with this game is that it was realesed to early. The dev's say they are working on bugs and gameplay. They have promised a patch every week, and it has been a patch every week so far. The game has a lot of potensial. I would not say that the game is unfinnished, it just has "some" bugs in it. Not like game breaking bugs. Rather like funny bugs. I highly recomend this game over all games. It does not cost a lot of money either.

Игра хороша и стоит своих денег, даже если создатели не докрутят ее до конца. Где еще так обидно быть первой жертвой вначале игры и когда маньяк стоит сука и не уходит. И супер сладкий вкус попеды кргда выжил последним. Эта игра приносит кучу эмоций как ни крути от радости до огорчения, страха быть пойманым. Выжившим кажется , что маньяк супер читер машина для убийств, а пробуешь им играть нифига не получается бегаешь из угла карты в другой и просираешь. Но все приходит с опытом. Советую всем приобрести постебаться пощекотать себе нервы, скоро должны допилить режим выживания с друзьями будет веселей. Свою цену оправдывает на все сто. Берите кто в детстве мечтал побегать по лесу с бензопилой за грибниками))))

Играл я значит такой в Dead by Daylight...Ну зашло ко мне в лобби 4 человека там 20 ранги и 6 ранг,ну я понял,что всё провал проиграю,но зайдя в игру 1 вылетел и их осталось 3...Первого я увидел и повесил,далее поймал 6 ранг,но он вышел и тут то я понял,что не получу определённое кол-во оков которое мне надо,но моё спасение было когда нашёлся понимающий человек.Он остался один бедненький чинивший генератор,ну я поймал его начал издеваться и получать очки,ну он понял,что ему не выжить и ещё целых 4 генератора понял,что даже не стоит рыпаться,кокого было его впечатление когда я показал ему путь к 4 генераторам,чтоб он их починил и дал ему путь домой...А мораль о в чём???Помогайте всем,даже если вы маньяк,а это ваша жертва!!!

The game isn't perfect but I can't stop playing because it's so much fun.
If you can look past its imprefections then it's definitely worth a buy.
The biggest issue is with the killer camping once they've hooked you.
In almost every match this happens.
It gets to the point where it's almost a free-for-all because it's rarely worth trying to save someone who's hooked when the killer is standing right in front of them or/and has placed a trap directly under.
Fun but frustrating at times.

Bu oyunu çıkmadan 1 hafta önce gördüm kesin alırım dedim nasip bugüneymiş 

ilk olarak grafikler gerçekten harika hava karanlık olsa bile aydınlatmalar sayesinde heryeri görebiliyosunuz 
bunun yanında karanlıkta eğilerek gittiğimizde katil bizi pek göremiyor 

oynanışa geçelim 4 kişi hayatta kalmaya çalışıyor. 1 tane katil var . katil bizi yakalayıp kancaya asıyor eğer kancadan kurtulamazsak ve arkadaşlarımız kurtaramazsa ölüyorüz. kancadan kurtulmaya çalışmayın çok zor bi ihtimalle kaçabiliriz ama genellikle ölürüz. 

katilden kaçarken yolları kapatacağımız yerler mevcut genellikle oralardan geçip kaçabiliriz. hayatta kalanların görevi jeneratörü çalıştırıp çıkış kapısından sağ salim kaçabilmek. eğer kaçarsanız yüksek miktarda experience kazanırsınız. kaçamazsanız da bi miktar kazanırsınız . bu experience lar oynadığımız hero nun (4 tane var) özelliklerini açmamızı sağlar. özellikler sayesinde hızımız artar vs. 

sadece lobiye girerken bir sıkıntı yaşarsınız o da yeni gelen patch ile düzeltilir. lobiye girmek biraz sıkıntılı hemen bulmuyor. 

korku oyununun online olması zaten güzel bir özellik 

ARTILAR: Oyunun grafikleri güzel
                 Kaçarken çıkan fon müzikleri 
                 Özelliğini arttırabildiğimiz kahramanlar
                 Online olması 
                 Muazzam atmosfer

EKSİLER: Lobiye girerken çıkan sorun
                Savaş mekanikleri biraz daha iyi olabilirdi.


Oynadıkça Anladığım BUGlar Yeni İnceleme :
1.)Adama can basarken yarıda kesildi ve bidaha canı dolmadı
2.)Kancada asılı adamın hiç canı gitmedi hep kancada asılı kaldı
3.)Kancada asılydım son can kala ölmem gerekirken ölmedim 5 dk boyunca asılı kaldım
4.)Katilin sırtından kaçtım ve o saatten sonra bidaha hiç bir jeneratör açamadım ve ya kapı açamadım öyle bir buga girdi ki sadece hareket ediyorum başka hiç bir şey yapamıyorum.

Big edit: Changing my review to positive after 5 years and returning to the game.

Pros:
- Enough randomness to make most games feel very unique.
- Very fun, intense gameplay.

Cons:
- Having perks and addons, and learning about the vast plethora of them all, feels a little too important at times. Winning and losing seems to revolve around them.
- I think the game would be more immersive without all the "wall hack" type abilities or supernatural killers personally.
- Some maps aren't very scary or engaging.
- Biggest complaint is definitely the invisibility of the MMR system and W/L ratios. Ranking up to Rank 1 means nothing really, except that you were active for a month and weren't terrible. Seeing one's MMR is what would allow people to know how statistically good they are, same with W/L ratios so that players can evaluate whether they lose all the time on this map or that map, against this killer or that killer, and so forth.

Overall I'll give the game a positive review, because it's simply fun, win or lose. But for the competitive aspect of the game, I think it would help a lot to add more information for players to review.

Do you like killing teen agers? How about running away from pysco hillbillies with chainsaws? This might just be the game for you. Although, if you like doing either of those things in the company of friends... well you better have atleast 4 other friends with 20 bucks in their pockets.

TLDR: Good game, would recomend if you like to play solo

The week leading up to the launch of this title, I was very excited. Watching a multitude of streamers play this game with their friends made me wish I could do the same. The hype was real. When the game went live a friend of mine and I bought this game anxious to cower in fear at the likes of machette clad macocists. We then spent about 20 minutes trying to figure out how to play together. Surely there was an "invite a friend" option we were over looking. After hosting and rehosting lobbies we discovered no such option exsists... What a let down! Dead By Daylight seems like the perfect platform to have a real horror shared-experience with friends but the only way to accomplish this is in a private game. To me, this seems like a huge over sight. 

Now, understandably, I can see the developers side of this decision. Sure, playing this game as a survivor with a friend could lead to some already unbalanced game play, however I think that the whole soul of this game revolves around surviving as a group and what better way to experience that than with a friend. In my opinion if the developers were worried about competetive balance, they should have just made the match making system allow friends and then work on developing a more competetive game mode in the future.

Rant aside, let's talk about the game. Overall i really enjoy the game. The ambianceis perfect. The maps are creepy, the character modles are pretty terrifying and the mechanics are pretty solid. The feeling you get as a survivor being chased through a cornfield by a psycotic chainsaw massacre-ist is second to none. Likewise, hunting survivors as a nearly invisible wraith is awesome. Sure there are some balance issues that are being addressed, that is fine. I am happy that the developers are quick to patch this title.

Dead By Daylight is certainly worth the money with one caveat: I hope you like playing by yourself! I, however, do not and will probably not be playing this game too much until i can actually match make with my friends or somehow convince more of my friends to make the purchase.

thought the devs were straight but after a month of the game being out I realised that they were far from it. let me start by saying that I didnt know dean hall changed his name and started working on this game, secondly how fucking hard is it to make a fucking multi player option, Suck my fucking b0bby bear you facking juking simulator creating cunts. btw nice update.

Yo en lo personal recomendaria este juego porque es divertido si no te lo tomas tan en serio (la gran mayoria de juegos son divertidos si no te pones super competitivo duh)+

Hay una gran variedad de mapas, spawns de objetivos, distintas estrategias y jugabilidad gracias a la gran cantidad de asesinos y habilidades que te obligan a jugar de cierta forma o puedes crear una forma de jugar segun el asesino que eligas o iras en contra y puedes divertirte mucho gracias a eso.

Tengo que admitir desde un punto de vista de una persona que juega los dos roles pero mayoritariamente el de superviviente que el juego no esta balanceado, hay una gran cantidad de desbalance, las partidas suelen estar a favor de los supervivientes debido a la comunicacion entre supervivientes externa al juego ademas del "GenRush" que molesta mucho al asesino y complica mucho la partida en el actual meta de reparar a cualquier costo (reparar estando herido y builds dedicadas a reparar como si fuera el fin del mundo)

Pero quitando esos contras el juego es muy divertido, la vas a pasar mal siendo novato debido al rank reset (hay supervivientes/asesinos que abandonan o directamente se quedan en rangos bajos para hacer bullying, aunque no lo puedo confirmar debido a la falta de tiempo en rangos bajos)

En el caso de que decidas comprar el juego te espero ahi en la fogata ya sea siendo tu compañero o adversario.
Sehr geiles Game, hier und da noch ein wenig Verbesserungswürdig, aber trotz allem sehr großer Suchtfaktor!!!

>>>>>>Please read<<<<<<<Dead by daylight, The name is correct because thats how long this game should have lasted. This game is filled with tons of crap and toxic players. Most of the time I fix around 1-3 generators per round, get hanged on a hook and then be the only one who dies and the rest of the team escapes fine. Also, in almost all of my games my team has thrown the killer at me causing me to die most times. Once I even found a Tool box and fixed almost all the generators. When I was hiding my "team mate" took the killer to me which then killed me and then he and the rest of the team escaped. You may think,"Oh, just another 12 year old who got one bad game is salty." Wrong. This has happend more than at least 20 times of my game time. And if I do manage to live with these unbalanced teams and such, the killer rage quits or alt-F4s out and I dont get the 5,000 bonus.  While we are on the topic of killers, since they are the hosts of the server and people connect to them, most of them have garbage connection. Once I got unhooked and teleported almost across the map. Most times after I jump over a wall and run a bit, it teleports me back and the kill is pulling my leg and I get down. Like, What the fuck. In a nutshell, if you want a "I'm just going to use you and kill you later" simulator, buy this game. Also, why is there only one game mode? Come up with more instead of just doing the same thing over and over. You can't even play with your friends on-line, only in private matches. You can't even voice chat with your team in game, just a small window to type in some stuff before the game starts. In a nutshell, this game has only one thing to do, toxic teams with no clue of how to save you, you will die every round, you will stay at rank 20, and you will rank up as slow as a turtle moving.
Good Game

Последний раз я играл в игру за Майкла в 2016 году, поддерживал игру с самого начала, до тех пор пока что то обновилось и лаунчер у них сломался, обновите драйвера мне писали и я обновил, сейчас всё работает но всё то же что и было прежде.

Починили лаунчер значит. Но лучше игра не становится ещё с добавления ведьмы и тотемов всяких. Всё так же ужасная подборка игроков, долго как и раньше ждёшь этих игроков. 
Про письма для идей новых маньяков которые я писал и говорить нечего.  Вот присвоили идеи и не чешутся.  Прекрасно конечно что они добавляют маньяков из фильмов и сериалов, но надо иметь чувство меры.
Ein sehr spaßiges Spiel das die 20€ komplett wert ist. Evtl könnte man einen Voice chat mit den anderen Survivorn reden kann.

As long as there is no match making with friends don't waste money on this game. This should be a minimum requirement for multiplayer games and after two patches it's still missing. Furthermore, the rank system is just broken as fuck and you're getting matched with random ranks. Could be a great game, but these things are a clear no-go so far.

In it's current state i can't say i recommend this game.  There's just too many balance issues that make it unfun to play as killer.  While this game has alot of promise the devs haven't showed to me that they have the ability to fix this game.  I'll check up on Dead by Daylight every now and then and will change my review if the game gets better.  But for now i would not recommend you buy this game.

I've played some scary games. I remember the scare the FNAF series gave me, but nothing compares to the sheer terror of this game. It's the thought of where is the killer and if he sees you that sends shivers throughout your body. Even after playing for a while, this game still manages to make me jump to the sudden appearance of the killer. If you're looking for a game that will keep you on your toes and the top of your game to stay alive, then look no further than this.

[b]Dead by Daylight[/b] может смело назваться проектом в жанре [b]Survival Horror[/b]. Да, идея не самая оригинальная и многократно использованная, но в умелых руках смотрится отлично. Игра полностью заставляет нас окунуться в атмосферу того, что Вы - жертва, просто жалкая игрушка в руках монстра, метающегося по всей карте в поисках Вашего тела, чтобы насадить на крюк и убить. Даже зная, что маньяком манипулирует десятилетний ребёнок, который толком догнать никого не сможет - невольно начинаешь бояться. Жуткая [b]атмосфера[/b] и мрачное оформление игровых локаций делают своё дело. Туман, осевший на земле серыми комьями; размытие даже на средней дистанции, из-за чего приходится полагаться на своё сердце, которое в самый последний момент подскажет местонахождение убийцы. Сразу становится видно, что [b]разработчики заострили внимание не на жалких "пугалках" и "скриммерах", а на атмосфере и страхе[/b]. Также, Dead by Daylight обладает [b]системой прокачки[/b] и экипировки своего персонажа. Однако, единственный и самый огромный недостаток сея проекта - [b]ранний доступ[/b]. К примеру, чтобы поиграть с другом - разработчики дали нам возможность создавать приватные лобби и матчи. А если Вы захотели поиграть с другом против других игроков - извольте нажимать на кнопочку "Поиск Лобби" одновременно, секунду в секунду. Не получилось? - Заново!
=====
Игровой проект [b]Dead by Daylight[/b] однозначно заслуживает покупки!

Отличная задумка, отличная реализация атмасферной части (самое главное). Годная графика.
Но после релиза вылезло дофига багов и недоделок.
В общем представляем вам:
Отсутствие явного баланса 15/10
Прыжки через окно и обратно 10/10 (очень увлекательный геймплей)
Отсутствие возможности нормальной игры с друзьями 10/10
При появлении которой опять же пострадает хлипкий баланс 9/10
Читеры, которые делают что хотят 10/10
Нырок последнего выжевшего в люк 11/10
Внешек на релиз можно было и побольше завезти 5/10

В общем, дабы не расстраиваться и не портить ожиданий от продукта, я бы пока не рекомендовал покупать игру, возможно позднее...

Best experience as a killer:

All four survivors rank 10 and under with rare perks.
-First guy got hooked, tried to escape and quit struggling after two seconds.
-Second guy got punished for cheesing on the bus, instantly leaves game.
-Third guy gets blocked from jumping window while cheesing, goes down, quits.
-I find the fourth guy hiding in a locker breathing, terrified and alone with 5 gens to go. I started making funny circles in front of his locker, he came out and I showed him the way to a gen through a window. After he was done he looked at me like I was his mum so I guided him to the next gen. Once he had only 3 to go I helped him find the hatch, he did his little crouch-360 noscope dance in gratitude and dove into the hatch.
I've never been so satisfied in a game as a killer. That guy fully deserved it.

The game has an uphill battle in terms of fixes and bugs, but the gameplay itself is really enjoyable. For the time being you may find it fun to be a survivor, but until at least the next patch comes out being a killer in high ranks can be frustrating.

Definitely recommend the game.

UPDATE Patch 1.0.2: Still testing it out, will update in a while.

I would not recommend this game in its current state, in fact I'm already on my way to getting a refund. It is horribly balanced, has no ability to play online with friends and has an entirely randomized talent tree. All tension melts away as one realizes how powerful the survivors are and how easy it is for them to win (unless they're cornered). Already the community has becme toxic as well, full of players that are fully knowledgable and able to taunt monsters and willing to ditch allies. Also there is no AI in private matches with friends so the 'true experience' can't be replicated. Stay far away. While a very good concept it leaves much to be desired.

I am not sure if the devs of this game even read this but this game is great and all until you meet someone who just sits at a window and jump back and forth it as a survivor because there is no possible way the killer can catch them. What the devs need to impliment for survivors is some sort of energy, I would love to see someone try to jump through a window 50 times and not get tired. The energy could be used to where if they use it all up they become slower than the killer at performing such things such as the window. The window speed difference was set as an advantage to get out of range of the killer and get away, not sit there and watch the killer walk back and forth helplessly trying to get somebody while the rest get objectives. If the killer leaves that survivor then they will just grab the closest generator since the windows are usually next to them. This would give a better balance between killer and survivor. I do recommend this game because when people actually play the game how it is meant to be played it is one of the most enjoyable games out there though.
